name: Ruined by UP2U
description:
Ruined is a puzzle/platformer game. The player has a limited number of moves that can be obtained by collecting 'key' items. The objective is to reach to white gate.

Control

A - Move left

D - Move right

E - Interact ( activate switch or warp)

Spacebar - Jump

R - Restart the stage

P - Return to the main menu

(Pressing and letting go of a button will count as 1 use)
